Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-38205 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.92.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-38205 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.92.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
